title: Turkey Pardon, Impeachment & 2020
itunes:title: Turkey Pardon, Impeachment & 2020
description:
Kevin spoke with Francis Creighton, President & CEO of the Consumer Data Industry Association, and long time Democratic Capitol Hill Staffer, including former chief of staff to Senator Chris Murphy, and Mattie Duppler, Senior Fellow at the National Taxpayers Union and former Former Coalitions Director for the House Republican Conference.


They discussed the historic vote over the weekend in Hong Kong. the impeachment inquiry, 2020 elections, and the annual "Turkey Pardon".

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
